item.title: Gansu, Shocking Story, and more SARS [China Compass]
item.description:
On this CCP, Ben mentions “the other CCP” before laying out plans for this podcast. He then introduces Gansu Province (8:00), where he lived, raised a family, but was eventually kicked out of.

He also tells the shocking story behind the title of his book Unbeaten (12:22), of his Gansu friends who suffered through a major earthquake, and shares about comical checkpoint scenes during SARS in 2003 (27:02).

Finally, he ends with a China Compass Q&A on the Chinese Church. (33:06)

item.title: China 101, Taiwan, and Surviving SARS [China Compass]
item.description:
Welcome to the first episode of the China Compass Podcast (CCP)!

Missionary Ben (Pen Name: B.F. Westen) introduces himself and shares why he is qualified to talk about China.

Then he dives into China 101 (9:02), answering foundational questions about China’s name, size, geography, peoples, and language.

After introducing Pray for China (19:50), he gives an overview of China’s outlying regions (24:42) (Taiwan, Hong Kong/Puerto Rico, and Macau) and his experiences there (34:00), including surviving SARS in 2003.
